atae/durkatlimmu/X660031
NA₄.KIŠIB {m}si-x-bu DUMU {m}ma-ar-da-nu URU.x x-a-a Bel ARAD SUM-an   {m}x x x-u-ṣu-x ARAD-šu₂ ša {m}si-x-bu DUMU {m}ma-ar-da-nu u₂-piš-ma {m}gab-x x x ina ŠA₃-bi x MA.NA KU₃.BABBAR il-qe kas-pu gam-mur ta-din ARAD šu₂-a-tu za-rip laq-qe tu-a-ru de-e-nu DUG₄.DUG₄ la-a-šu₂ man-nu ša₂ GIL-u-ni IGI {m}{d}DI-ma-nu-x x IGI {m}x x x-ka IGI {m}x x x-ʾ ITU.x UD-4-KAM₂ lim-me {m}{d}PA-MAN-PAP
